sentences.en: At first, I redefine the definition Space.
sentences.cn: 首先要做的是概念解析与定义.

sentences.en: AutoCorrect entry for  007  000 already exists. Do you want to redefine it?
sentences.cn: 000的“自动更正”词条已经存在. 是否要重新定义?

sentences.en: Be prepared to redefine this factor as conditions change.
sentences.cn: 随着情况的变化,随时准备重新判定着一因素.

sentences.en: But then biologists will merely redefine life.
sentences.cn: 而那时,生物学家就只能重新定义生命.

sentences.en: Cannot redefine a simple type as complex type.
sentences.cn: 不能将简单类型重定义为复杂类型.

sentences.en: Cannot redefine popup that is in use.
sentences.cn: 不能重定义正在使用的弹出式菜单.

sentences.en: Do you want to redefine the AutoText entry?
sentences.cn: 是否重新定义这一“自动图文集”词条?

sentences.en: Expect it and redefine it as energy so you can move on.
sentences.cn: 预备好并重新定义恐惧,把它看着一种推动力,这样你就可以继续前行了.

sentences.en: Feminists have redefined the role of women.
sentences.cn: 女权主义者们已重新定义了女性角色。

sentences.en: Functions become constants and you cannot assign to them or redefine them.
sentences.cn: 函数变成常数,无法给它们赋值或重定义它们.

sentences.en: LIME Habitat in Island East will redefine luxury living.
sentences.cn: 形品位于港岛东,落成后将带动区内型格生活品味潮流.

sentences.en: Redefine your audience generally means changing how you see your audience.
sentences.cn: 重新定义听众通常意味着改变你对听众的看法.

sentences.en: So the F . C . C . proposes to redefine broadband as telecommunication a telecommunications service.
sentences.cn: 因此联邦通信委员会打算将宽带重新定义为电信服务.

sentences.en: The advent of the Euro will redefine Europe.
sentences.cn: 欧元的出现将重新定义欧洲.

sentences.en: We will finally have to redefine our relationship with neighbouring states in north Africa.
sentences.cn: 我们最终将不得不重新界定我们和北非邻国的关系。

sentences.en: Your search returned no results. Redefine your query and search again.
sentences.cn: 您的搜索未返回任何结果. 请重新定义查询并再次搜索.

trans.tran_en: If you redefine something, you cause people to consider it in a new way
